sentences: On Saturday afternoon, 6 December, UNFCCC Deputy Executive Secretary Richard Kinley informed parties of the administrative and budgetary implications of the conclusions adopted by the SBSTA.
Rapporteur Jurga Rabazauskaite-Survile (Lithuania) presented, and the SBSTA adopted, the report of the session (FCCC/SBSTA/2014/L.20).
SBSTA Chair Dlamini closed the SBSTA 42 at 5:03 pm.
For a summary of the statements made during the closing plenary of the SBSTA, see: http://www.iisd.ca/vol12/enb12614e.html
